text: Colin Gubbins was Major-General Sir Colin McVean Gubbins KCMG DSO MC (2 July 1896 â€“ 11 February 1976). He was head of the Special Operations Executive (SOE) in the Second World War. Gubbins was also responsible for setting up the secret Auxiliary Units, a civilian force to operate behind the German lines if the United Kingdom was invaded during Operation Sea Lion, Germany's planned invasion. == References == Category:1896 births Category:1976 deaths Category:British Army generals
title: Colin Gubbins
